title: Last Week in Dockets
text: following table summarizes ADAMS documents following dockets: MSRR Pre-Application MSRR Docket Shine Docket Shine Pre-Application Xe-100 Pre-Application Natrium Pre-Application UIUC HTGR Pre-Application eVinci Pre-Application IMSR Pre-Application KP-X Pre-Application Hermes Docket Oklo Pre-Application Aurora Docket
code: nrcadams::docket_codex |> dplyr::pull(DocketNumber) |> nrcadams::search_docket(days_back = 7) |> dplyr::mutate(Title = paste0("", Title, '')) |> dplyr::left_join(nrcadams::docket_codex) |> dplyr::filter(NLWR) |> dplyr::select(-c(URL, Company, DocketNumber, NLWR)) |> DT::datatable( caption = "The Last 7 Days of Posted NLWR Licensing Documents.", filter = list(position = 'top', clear = TRUE, plain = FALSE), escape = FALSE ) #> Searching with the following URL: #> https://adams.nrc.gov/wba/services/search/advanced/nrc?q=(mode:sections,sections:(filters:(public-library:!t),properties_search_any:!(!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902088',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'05000610',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'05000608',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902034',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902071',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902100',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902094',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902079',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902076',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99900003',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902049',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902078',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902069',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'05007513',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902095',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'05200049','')),properties_search:!(!(PublishDatePARS,gt,'12/27/2022+12:00+AM',''))))&qn=New&tab=content-search-pars&z=0 #> Joining, by = "DocketNumber"

title: Last Week in Dockets

code: nrcadams::docket_codex |> dplyr::pull(DocketNumber) |> nrcadams::search_docket(days_back = 7) |> dplyr::mutate(Title = paste0("", Title, '')) |> dplyr::left_join(nrcadams::docket_codex) |> dplyr::filter(!NLWR) |> dplyr::select(-c(URL, Company, DocketNumber, NLWR)) |> DT::datatable( caption = "The Last 7 Days of Posted LWR Licensing Documents.", filter = list(position = 'top', clear = TRUE, plain = FALSE), escape = FALSE ) #> Searching with the following URL: #> https://adams.nrc.gov/wba/services/search/advanced/nrc?q=(mode:sections,sections:(filters:(public-library:!t),properties_search_any:!(!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902088',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'05000610',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'05000608',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902034',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902071',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902100',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902094',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902079',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902076',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99900003',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902049',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902078',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902069',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'05007513',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902095',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'05200049','')),properties_search:!(!(PublishDatePARS,gt,'12/27/2022+12:00+AM',''))))&qn=New&tab=content-search-pars&z=0 #> Joining, by = "DocketNumber"

title: Docket Search
text: One confusing aspects NRC’s document repository NRC assigns docket numbers. pre-application engagement, companies assigned docket number starts 999. NRC accepts companies license application review, NRC assign docket number based upon type license. example, companies applying traditional two stage license Part 50 docket number begins 050. Companies applying combined operating license Part 52 docket number begins 052. Even applicant receives docket number given facility design, applicant may still submit documents pre-application docket information support future licensing submittals.
code: nrcadams::docket_codex |>   DT::datatable(     caption = "Exported Docket Numbers in the `nrcadams` Package.",     filter = list(position = 'top', clear = TRUE, plain = FALSE)     )

what: Keeping Up to Date with a Docket
title: Docket Search
text: open regulatory, NRC required publicly provide non-proprietary non-export controlled information public. applicant submits proprietary document, NRC post non-proprietary portions document ADAMS. NRC typically strives ensure enough information public sphere justify licensing actions. keep --date ACU’s MSRR license, best search pre-application docketed information.
code: nrcadams::docket_codex |> dplyr::filter(Company == "ACU") |> dplyr::pull(DocketNumber) |> nrcadams::search_docket(days_back = 60) |> dplyr::mutate(Title = paste0("", Title, '')) |> dplyr::select(-URL) |> DT::datatable( caption = "The last 60 Days of the MSRR's Posted Licensing Documents.", filter = list(position = 'top', clear = TRUE, plain = FALSE), escape = FALSE ) #> Searching with the following URL: #> https://adams.nrc.gov/wba/services/search/advanced/nrc?q=(mode:sections,sections:(filters:(public-library:!t),properties_search_any:!(!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902088',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'05000610','')),properties_search:!(!(PublishDatePARS,gt,'11/4/2022+12:00+AM',''))))&qn=New&tab=content-search-pars&z=0

what: Filtering a Docket for Actual Information
title: Docket Search
text: given docket include email correspondence addition reports safety evaluations. Generally, letters emails noise signal can filtered search results. Instead mucking around ADAMS API filter results, simpler use dplyr::filter filter returned results.
code: nrcadams::docket_codex |> dplyr::filter(Company == "X-Energy") |> dplyr::pull(DocketNumber) |> nrcadams::search_docket() |> dplyr::filter( !stringr::str_detect(Type, "E-Mail"), !stringr::str_detect(Type, "Letter") )|> dplyr::mutate(Title = paste0("", Title, '')) |> dplyr::select(-URL) |> DT::datatable( caption = "X-Energy's Pre-Applicaion Docket without Letters and Emails.", filter = list(position = 'top', clear = TRUE, plain = FALSE), escape = FALSE ) #> Searching with the following URL: #> https://adams.nrc.gov/wba/services/search/advanced/nrc?q=(mode:sections,sections:(filters:(public-library:!t),properties_search_any:!(!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902071',''))))&qn=New&tab=advanced-search-pars&z=0

title: Authors and Citation
Authors and Citation
text: Denman M (2023). nrcadams: Pulls Data NRC's ADAMS database. R package version 0.1.1.0000, https://mrdenman-nuclear.github.io/nrcadams/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {nrcadams: Pulls Data from NRC's ADAMS database},   author = {Matthew Denman},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.1.0000},   url = {https://mrdenman-nuclear.github.io/nrcadams/}, }

what: Pulls Data from NRC's ADAMS database
title: Pulls Data from NRC's ADAMS database
text: R package used pull data NRC’s ADAMS document repository. ever want keep track recent back forth applicants NRC find NRC web based ADAMS searches cumbersome? , package might !

title: Pulls Data from NRC's ADAMS database
text: R package based tidyverse, R tidyverse installation recommended. Web based ADAMS results processed xml, xml2 package prerequisite. package programmed using base R pipes, versions R greater 4.1 required. Please install package using remotes: package unlikely published CRAN.

title: Pulls Data from NRC's ADAMS database
text: nrcadams package fairly limited time. key functionality runs search_docket. least one docket number required, can filter results specifying many days past want search well search terms. function outputs tibble results including URLs documents.
code: ACU_MSRR <- c(99902088, 05000610) ACU_MSRR |>   nrcadams::search_docket(     days_back = 20,     search_term = "Acceptance"     )

text: DocketNumber dbl/vector: Docket number (numbers) searched ADAMS search_term chr: search term desired. Default nothing (.e., NULL) days_back dbl: Length time search extends days since document published ADAMS? Default time (.e, NULL)

title: Conduct ADAMS Search on Docket Numbers — search_docket
Conduct ADAMS Search on Docket Numbers — search_docket
code: nrcadams::docket_codex |>     dplyr::filter(Company == "ACU") |>     dplyr::pull(DocketNumber) |>     nrcadams::search_docket() #> Searching with the following URL: #>  https://adams.nrc.gov/wba/services/search/advanced/nrc?q=(mode:sections,sections:(filters:(public-library:!t),properties_search_any:!(!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902088',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'05000610',''))))&qn=New&tab=advanced-search-pars&z=0 #> # A tibble: 55 × 7 #>    Title              Document…¹ `Publish Date`      Type  Affil…² URL   Docke…³ #>    <chr>              <date>     <dttm>              <chr> <chr>   <chr>   <dbl> #>  1 Abilene Christian… 2022-12-16 2022-12-19 08:48:00 Lett… NRC/NR… "htt…  5.00e6 #>  2 FRN on Abilene Ch… 2022-11-28 2022-12-06 08:29:00 Fede… NRC/NR… "htt…  5.00e6 #>  3 12/09/2022 Public… 2022-11-21 2022-11-21 12:58:00 Meet… NRC/NRR "htt…  5.00e6 #>  4 Abilene Christian… 2022-11-18 2022-11-18 14:27:00 Acce… NRC/NR… "htt…  5.00e6 #>  5 NEXT - Submittal … 2022-01-26 2022-11-01 12:00:00 Lett… Abilen… "htt…  9.99e7 #>  6 Response to NRC R… 2022-10-20 2022-11-01 12:00:00 Resp… Abilen… "htt…  9.99e7 #>  7 Revisions to the … 2022-10-25 2022-11-01 12:00:00 Lett… Abilen… "htt…  9.99e7 #>  8 Abilene Christian… 2022-10-14 2022-11-01 12:00:00 Lett… Abilen… "htt…  9.99e7 #>  9 FRN for Abilene C… 2022-10-07 2022-10-14 08:30:00 Fede… NRC/NR… "htt…  9.99e7 #> 10 Request for Suppl… 2022-09-27 2022-09-27 16:01:00 Requ… NRC/NR… "htt…  9.99e7 #> # … with 45 more rows, and abbreviated variable names ¹​`Document Date`, #> #   ²​Affiliation, ³​DocketNumber

code: c("ML22179A346", "ML19211C119") |> nrcadams::search_ml() #> Searching with the following URL: #>  https://adams.nrc.gov/wba/services/search/advanced/nrc?q=(mode:sections,sections:(filters:(public-library:!t),properties_search_any:!(!(AccessionNumber,starts,ML22179A346,''),!(AccessionNumber,starts,ML19211C119,''))))&qn=New&tab=content-search-pars&z=0 #> # A tibble: 2 × 7 #>   Title               Document…¹ `Publish Date`      Type  Affil…² URL   Docke…³ #>   <chr>               <date>     <dttm>              <chr> <chr>   <chr>   <dbl> #> 1 "NUREG-2183, DFC, … 2022-06-30 2022-07-05 08:26:00 NURE… NRC/NM… "htt… 5000608 #> 2 "SHINE Medical Tec… 2019-07-17 2019-08-13 10:46:00 Fina… SHINE … "htt… 5000608 #> # … with abbreviated variable names ¹​`Document Date`, ²​Affiliation, #> #   ³​DocketNumber
